mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company (id, companyName, email, password, address, companyNum, status, companyImage) VALUES (#{id}, #{companyName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{address}, #{companyNum}, #{status}, #{companyImage});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company WHERE id = #{id}
select id,name,email from company where email=#{email}
select password from person where id=#{id} and email=#{email}
